content:
Today I chose PR 17249 for discussion!

feat(analysis/seminorm): characterize continuity of seminorms by closed balls
Created by @Anatole Dedecker (@ADedecker) on 2022-10-29
Labels: awaiting-review, t-analysis

Is this PR still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
This is definitely still relevant. I just merged master to make sure that everything still compiles (which it probably won't, especially because of norm notation).
